methods: abstract PendingResult<Status> addListener(GoogleApiClient client, NodeApi.NodeListener listener) Registers a listener to receive all node events.
abstract PendingResult<NodeApi.GetConnectedNodesResult> getConnectedNodes(GoogleApiClient client) Gets a list of Nodes to which this device is currently connected.
abstract PendingResult<NodeApi.GetLocalNodeResult> getLocalNode(GoogleApiClient client) Gets the Node that refers to this device.
abstract PendingResult<Status> removeListener(GoogleApiClient client, NodeApi.NodeListener listener) Removes a listener.
